entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-21
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Editorconfig in nuget package is not respected when NUGET_PACKAGES does not end with trailing slash #72657
  • Regions should be included in code block grouping #72641
  • IDE0300 triggered for `dynamic` target type #72640
  • Search in options window doesn't show all matches in the pages tree view #72639
  • Navigation to source link is broken #72638
  • VS .editorConfig UI does not handle different settings for different languages. #72637
  • SemanticModel.GetDeconstructionInfo returns different results for not accessible call with/without await #72634
  • Move type code fix results in compile error with primary constructors #72632
    Backlog
  • InvokeNavigateToForGeneratedFile is failing in integration tests. #72627

Closed

  • Hitting Debug.Assert in `LocalRewriter_CompoundAssignmentOperator` when compiling Razor.sln #72626
    17.10
  • Add public API to determine if a call is being intercepted #72093
    17.10
  • Use Pattern Matching suggestion gives faulty code #72370
    Backlog
  • Doc comment completions should not insert `=""` if there is already one #72259
    Backlog
  • [Bug]: Suggestion `IDE0300` does not appear for arguments in primary constructor's base class constructor #72337
    Backlog
  • Inconsistent dispose behavior between `await using` and `await foreach` #72573
    17.10
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-34720.100 #72629

PullRequests

Created

  • Fixes for Linux release build #72658
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Experimenting with segmented collection changes #72656
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Collection expressions: require Add method callable with a single argument for class and struct types that do not use [CollectionBuilder] #72654
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Move to SegmentedList for line indexes #72652
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Introduce a concept of internal special types, move all members defined in special types to the SpecialMember set. #72646
    Concept-API, Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2410756 #72644
    auto-merge
  • Emit extensions as plain struct types #72643
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Remove unnecessary string[] allocations #72642
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Merge release/dev17.9 to release/dev17.10 #72636
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Hande error scenarios involving target types and named arguments in nullable walker #72635
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Fix infinite load loop loading WPF projects in VSCode #72625
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Add support for Copilot #72655
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Implement ValueBuilder types for immutable collections #62193
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Start new compiler test project as Emit2 is reaching text limit #72649
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Account for un-lowered nodes in CanChangeValueBetweenReads #72651
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Primary Constructors, Next
  • Unify C# and VB implementations of TestCompletionInLinkedFiles #72653
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Reduce allocations in SolutionCompilationState.CreateCompilationTrackerMap #72596
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Remove unused resource strings #72648
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge 'main' into RefStructInterfaces #72650
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - RefStructInterfaces
  • Remove unnecessary component load #72647
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Qualify the type when negating a pattern to a not pattern #72466
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Do not include privates when emitting skeleton references #72645
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • [17.9] Convert official pipeline to 1ES template #72630
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Suppress preexisting SDL errors #72633
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Replay Binary Log Tool #72619
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Add support for PrimaryConstructorBaseType to SpeculativeAnalyser #72421
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Do not put an equals and quotes when completing an xml attribute if present #72508
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Prefer pattern-based over interface-based disposal in await using #72598
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Adjust extension member lookup to prefer more specific members #72510
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Language Feature - Roles
  • Break added documents into batches when processing solution/compilation translation states. #72621
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.10 to main #72352
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Disable integration tests #72628
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Don't classify regex/json in binary string addition #72620
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Be resilient to asset-cache mutating while retrieving assets from the host #72599
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Small allocation optimization in StateTable.Builder.ToImmutable #72364
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Provide option to only update source-generators on special events (like a build) #72494
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Disallow modifiers in local_using_declaration #72589
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Avoid creating result temp for is-expressions (follow-up) #72273
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Semantic search #71268
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add CreateTokenParser public API #72622
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Update EOL versions #72623
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Log build host stack trace in exception handling #72624
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.ExternalAccess.VisualDiagnostics #72296
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove system for dumping text files into memory mapped files. #70160
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Remove the IBuildOnlyDiagnosticService #72447
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • All pull diagnostics changes. #62771
    Area-IDE
  • Add support for AIOSP to search only the current document or current project. #72293
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • [C#] Make interpolated strings including string or char constants as optimized as `+` operator #72308
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Recover from wrong collection expression target type in nullable walker #72616
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions
